author: jta
msg: DERBY-1422 (partial): Added ASF license headers to source files.
Adding the headers to the source files changed the generated anchors
in the built files, which is why files under build/site were modified.
Remaining work: xdocs/manuals has the copyright and notice files that
go with the original contribution of manuals, which were moved out
of the web site source and into derby/docs/branches/10.0. Will verify
handling on derby-dev before changing this.

- Added -sources and -javadoc jars to the release.

author: aheritier
msg: Upgrade wagon dependencies to match the ones loaded in the core.
